Desc.entry: Services provided include cranial osteopathy (Bill Eakins, Registered Osteopath). Costs approx £40 for first one-hour consultation and £30 for 30 minute follow up treatments. Please contact for up-to-date details of prices.

DisabledAccess.entry: Wheelchair user would need to be accompanied by own assistant

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon 9am-6pm; Tues 9am-6.30pm; Wed 9am-12.30pm; Thurs 12noon-7pm; Fri 9am-12noon; Sat 9am-1pm

ProvisionPlaceDisabledAccess.entry: Wheelchair user would need to be accompanied by own assistant
